findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner can stop transactions for all users by setting the `tradingEnable` variable to false.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner can increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%).

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Functions that are not used in the contract make the code's size bigger.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause lose of prediction.

findings.title: Owner Manipulation of Fees
findings.description: The owner can manipulate fees up to 100% and disable trades.
findings.location: Admin functions in the Baby Kabosu Inu contract

findings.title: Potential Honeypot Creation
findings.description: The contract can be converted into a honeypot, preventing users from selling if the owner abuses admin functions.
